
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/mzq123/p/19021170" title="å‘å¸ƒäº 2025-08-04 11:17">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">SpringBootç³»åˆ—ä¹‹é›†æˆEasyExcelå®ç°ç™¾ä¸‡çº§åˆ«çš„æ•°æ®å¯¼å…¥å¯¼å‡ºå®è·µ</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<h1 id="spring-boot-ç³»åˆ—é›†æˆ-easyexcel-å®ç°ç™¾ä¸‡çº§æ•°æ®å¯¼å…¥å¯¼å‡ºå®æˆ˜">Spring Boot ç³»åˆ—ï¼šé›†æˆ EasyExcel å®ç°ç™¾ä¸‡çº§æ•°æ®å¯¼å…¥å¯¼å‡ºå®æˆ˜</h1>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://smilenicky.blog.csdn.net/category_9195353.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">SpringBootä¸å¾®æœåŠ¡å®è·µç³»åˆ—åšå®¢</a></li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p>æœ¬æ–‡åŸºäºå¼€æºé¡¹ç›® <a href="https://github.com/u014427391/springbootexamples/tree/master/springboot-easyexcel-batch" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">springboot-easyexcel-batch</a> è¿›è¡Œè§£æä¸æ‰©å±•ï¼Œæ‰‹æŠŠæ‰‹æ•™ä½ å¦‚ä½•åœ¨ <strong>Spring Boot 2.2.1</strong> ä¸­é›†æˆ <strong>Alibaba EasyExcel</strong>ï¼Œè½»æ¾å®ç° <strong>ç™¾ä¸‡çº§æ•°æ®çš„å¯¼å…¥ä¸å¯¼å‡º</strong>ã€‚</p>
</blockquote>

<h2 id="ç›®å½•">ç›®å½•</h2>

<li><a href="#%E6%A0%B8%E5%BF%83%E4%BE%9D%E8%B5%96" rel="noopener nofollow">æ ¸å¿ƒä¾èµ–</a></li>
<li><a href="#%E7%99%BE%E4%B8%87%E7%BA%A7%E5%AF%BC%E5%87%BA%E5%AE%9E%E6%88%98" rel="noopener nofollow">ç™¾ä¸‡çº§å¯¼å‡ºå®æˆ˜</a></li>
<li><a href="#%E7%99%BE%E4%B8%87%E7%BA%A7%E5%AF%BC%E5%85%A5%E5%AE%9E%E6%88%98" rel="noopener nofollow">ç™¾ä¸‡çº§å¯¼å…¥å®æˆ˜</a></li>
<li><a href="#%E6%80%A7%E8%83%BD%E4%BC%98%E5%8C%96%E6%8A%80%E5%B7%A7" rel="noopener nofollow">æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜åŒ–æŠ€å·§</a></li>
<li><a href="#%E5%B8%B8%E8%A7%81%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98--%E8%A7%A3%E5%86%B3%E6%96%B9%E6%A1%88" rel="noopener nofollow">å¸¸è§é—®é¢˜ &amp; è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆ</a></li>

<h2 id="é¡¹ç›®ç»“æ„æ¦‚è§ˆ">é¡¹ç›®ç»“æ„æ¦‚è§ˆ</h2>
<pre><code>springboot-easyexcel-batch
â”œâ”€â”€ src/main/java/com/example/easyexcel
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ controller/      # å¯¼å…¥å¯¼å‡ºæ¥å£
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ listener/        # å¯¼å…¥ç›‘å¬å™¨
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ model/           # å®ä½“ç±»
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ service/         # ä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ Application.java # å¯åŠ¨ç±»
â””â”€â”€ src/main/resources
    â”œâ”€â”€ application.yml  # çº¿ç¨‹æ± é…ç½®
    â””â”€â”€ templates/       # å‰ç«¯demo
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2 id="æ ¸å¿ƒä¾èµ–">æ ¸å¿ƒä¾èµ–</h2>
<pre><code class="language-xml">&lt;!-- Spring Boot 2.2.1 --&gt;
&lt;parent&gt;
    &lt;groupId&gt;org.springframework.boot&lt;/groupId&gt;
    &lt;artifactId&gt;spring-boot-starter-parent&lt;/artifactId&gt;
    &lt;version&gt;2.2.1.RELEASE&lt;/version&gt;
&lt;/parent&gt;

&lt;!-- EasyExcel 2.2.11ï¼ˆç¨³å®šç‰ˆï¼‰ --&gt;
&lt;dependency&gt;
    &lt;groupId&gt;com.alibaba&lt;/groupId&gt;
    &lt;artifactId&gt;easyexcel&lt;/artifactId&gt;
    &lt;version&gt;2.2.11&lt;/version&gt;
&lt;/dependency&gt;
</code></pre>

<h2 id="ç™¾ä¸‡çº§å¯¼å‡ºå®æˆ˜">ç™¾ä¸‡çº§å¯¼å‡ºå®æˆ˜</h2>
<h3 id="1ï¸âƒ£-åœºæ™¯">1ï¸âƒ£ åœºæ™¯</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>éœ€æ±‚</th>
<th>æ•°æ®é‡</th>
<th>ç­–ç•¥</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>å¯¼å‡ºç”¨æˆ·è¡¨</td>
<td>100ä¸‡+</td>
<td>åˆ†Sheet + åˆ†æ‰¹æŸ¥è¯¢ + è¾¹æŸ¥è¾¹å†™</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3 id="2ï¸âƒ£-æ ¸å¿ƒä»£ç ">2ï¸âƒ£ æ ¸å¿ƒä»£ç </h3>
<pre><code class="language-java">package com.example.easyexcel.service;

import com.alibaba.excel.EasyExcel;
import com.alibaba.excel.ExcelWriter;
import com.alibaba.excel.write.metadata.WriteSheet;
import com.example.easyexcel.model.User;
import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
import org.springframework.scheduling.concurrent.ThreadPoolTaskExecutor;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;

import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.OutputStream;
import java.net.URLEncoder;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;

@Service
@Slf4j
public class ExcelExportService {

    private final ThreadPoolTaskExecutor excelExecutor;
    private final UserService userService;

    // æ¯ä¸ªSheetçš„æ•°æ®é‡
    private static final int DATA_PER_SHEET = 100000;

    // æ¯æ¬¡æŸ¥è¯¢çš„æ•°æ®é‡
    private static final int QUERY_BATCH_SIZE = 10000;

    public ExcelExportService(ThreadPoolTaskExecutor excelExecutor, UserService userService) {
        this.excelExecutor = excelExecutor;
        this.userService = userService;
    }

    /**
     * å¯¼å‡ºç™¾ä¸‡çº§ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®ï¼ˆä¼˜åŒ–å†…å­˜ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼‰
     */
    public void exportMillionUsers(HttpServletResponse response, long totalCount) throws IOException {
        // è®¾ç½®å“åº”å¤´
        response.setContentType("application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet");
        response.setCharacterEncoding("utf-8");
        String fileName = URLEncoder.encode("ç™¾ä¸‡ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®", "UTF-8").replaceAll("\\+", "%20");
        response.setHeader("Content-disposition", "attachment;filename*=utf-8''" + fileName + ".xlsx");
        response.setHeader("Cache-Control", "no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate");
        response.setHeader("Pragma", "no-cache");
        response.setDateHeader("Expires", 0);

        // è®¡ç®—æ€»Sheetæ•°
        int sheetCount = (int) (totalCount / DATA_PER_SHEET + (totalCount % DATA_PER_SHEET &gt; 0 ? 1 : 0));
        log.info("éœ€è¦ç”Ÿæˆçš„Sheetæ€»æ•°ï¼š{}", sheetCount);

        try (OutputStream os = response.getOutputStream()) {
            // åˆ›å»ºExcelWriterï¼Œç›´æ¥å†™å…¥å“åº”è¾“å‡ºæµ
            ExcelWriter excelWriter = EasyExcel.write(os, User.class).build();

            // ç”¨äºä¿è¯Sheetå†™å…¥é¡ºåºçš„å‰ä¸€ä¸ªFuture
            CompletableFuture&lt;Void&gt; previousFuture = CompletableFuture.completedFuture(null);

            for (int sheetNo = 0; sheetNo &lt; sheetCount; sheetNo++) {
                final int currentSheetNo = sheetNo;
                long start = currentSheetNo * (long) DATA_PER_SHEET;
                long end = Math.min((currentSheetNo + 1) * (long) DATA_PER_SHEET, totalCount);

                // æ¯ä¸ªSheetçš„å¤„ç†ä¾èµ–äºå‰ä¸€ä¸ªSheetå®Œæˆï¼Œä¿è¯é¡ºåº
                previousFuture = previousFuture.thenRunAsync(() -&gt; {
                    try {
                        log.info("å¼€å§‹å¤„ç†Sheet {} çš„æ•°æ®ï¼ˆ{} - {}ï¼‰", currentSheetNo, start, end);
                        writeSheetData(excelWriter, currentSheetNo, start, end);
                        log.info("å®Œæˆå¤„ç†Sheet {} çš„æ•°æ®", currentSheetNo);
                    } catch (Exception e) {
                        log.error("å¤„ç†Sheet {} æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥", currentSheetNo, e);
                        throw new RuntimeException("å¤„ç†Sheet " + currentSheetNo + " æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥", e);
                    }
                }, excelExecutor);
            }

            // ç­‰å¾…æ‰€æœ‰Sheetå¤„ç†å®Œæˆ
            previousFuture.join();

            // å®Œæˆå†™å…¥
            excelWriter.finish();
            log.info("æ‰€æœ‰Sheetå†™å…¥å®Œæˆ");

        } catch (Exception e) {
            log.error("Excelå¯¼å‡ºå¤±è´¥", e);
            throw e;
        }
    }

    /**
     * å†™å…¥å•ä¸ªSheetçš„æ•°æ®
     */
    private void writeSheetData(ExcelWriter excelWriter, int sheetNo, long start, long end) {
        String sheetName = "ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®" + (sheetNo + 1);
        WriteSheet writeSheet = EasyExcel.writerSheet(sheetNo, sheetName).build();

        long totalToQuery = end - start;
        int totalWritten = 0;

        // åˆ†æ‰¹æŸ¥è¯¢å¹¶å†™å…¥ï¼Œæ¯æ‰¹æŸ¥è¯¢åç«‹å³å†™å…¥ï¼Œä¸ç¼“å­˜å¤§é‡æ•°æ®
        for (long i = 0; i &lt; totalToQuery; i += QUERY_BATCH_SIZE) {
            long currentStart = start + i;
            long currentEnd = Math.min(start + i + QUERY_BATCH_SIZE, end);

            // è°ƒç”¨UserServiceæŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®
            List&lt;User&gt; batchData = userService.findUsersByRange(currentStart, currentEnd);

            if (batchData == null || batchData.isEmpty()) {
                log.info("{} - {} èŒƒå›´æ²¡æœ‰æ•°æ®", currentStart, currentEnd);
                break; // æ²¡æœ‰æ›´å¤šæ•°æ®ï¼Œæå‰é€€å‡º
            }

            // ç›´æ¥å†™å…¥è¿™ä¸€æ‰¹æ•°æ®
            excelWriter.write(batchData, writeSheet);
            totalWritten += batchData.size();

            log.info("Sheet {} å·²å†™å…¥ {} - {} èŒƒå›´çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œç´¯è®¡ {} æ¡",
                    sheetName, currentStart, currentEnd, totalWritten);

            // æ¸…é™¤å¼•ç”¨ï¼Œå¸®åŠ©GC
            batchData = new ArrayList&lt;&gt;();
        }

        log.info("Sheet {} å†™å…¥å®Œæˆï¼Œå…± {} æ¡æ•°æ®", sheetName, totalWritten);
    }
}


</code></pre>
<h3 id="3ï¸âƒ£-æ•ˆæœ">3ï¸âƒ£ æ•ˆæœ</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>æŒ‡æ ‡</th>
<th>ä¼˜åŒ–å‰</th>
<th>ä¼˜åŒ–å</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>å†…å­˜å³°å€¼</td>
<td>1.2GB</td>
<td>100MB</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>è€—æ—¶</td>
<td>45s</td>
<td>18s</td>
</tr>

<h2 id="ç™¾ä¸‡çº§å¯¼å…¥å®æˆ˜">ç™¾ä¸‡çº§å¯¼å…¥å®æˆ˜</h2>
<h3 id="1ï¸âƒ£-åœºæ™¯-1">1ï¸âƒ£ åœºæ™¯</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>éœ€æ±‚</th>
<th>æ•°æ®é‡</th>
<th>ç­–ç•¥</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>å¯¼å…¥ç”¨æˆ·è¡¨</td>
<td>100ä¸‡+</td>
<td>åˆ†Sheet + ç›‘å¬å™¨ + æ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3 id="2ï¸âƒ£-ç›‘å¬å™¨å’Œserviceæ ¸å¿ƒ">2ï¸âƒ£ ç›‘å¬å™¨å’ŒServiceï¼ˆæ ¸å¿ƒï¼‰</h3>
<pre><code class="language-java">package com.example.easyexcel.listener;

import com.alibaba.excel.context.AnalysisContext;
import com.alibaba.excel.event.AnalysisEventListener;
import com.example.easyexcel.model.User;
import com.example.easyexcel.service.UserService;
import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong;

/**
 * ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®å¯¼å…¥ç›‘å¬å™¨ï¼ˆç‹¬ç«‹ç±»å®ç°ï¼‰
 */
@Slf4j
public class UserImportListener extends AnalysisEventListener&lt;User&gt; {

    // æ‰¹é‡ä¿å­˜é˜ˆå€¼ï¼ˆå¯æ ¹æ®å†…å­˜è°ƒæ•´ï¼‰
    private static final int BATCH_SIZE = 5000;
    
    // ä¸´æ—¶å­˜å‚¨æ‰¹æ¬¡æ•°æ®
    private final List&lt;User&gt; batchList = new ArrayList&lt;&gt;(BATCH_SIZE);
    
    // å¯¼å…¥ç»“æœç»Ÿè®¡
    private final AtomicLong successCount = new AtomicLong(0);
    private final AtomicLong failCount = new AtomicLong(0);
    
    // ä¸šåŠ¡æœåŠ¡ï¼ˆé€šè¿‡æ„é€ å™¨æ³¨å…¥ï¼‰
    private final UserService userService;

    public UserImportListener(UserService userService) {
        this.userService = userService;
    }

    /**
     * æ¯è¯»å–ä¸€è¡Œæ•°æ®è§¦å‘
     */
    @Override
    public void invoke(User user, AnalysisContext context) {
        // æ•°æ®éªŒè¯
        if (validateUser(user)) {
            batchList.add(user);
            successCount.incrementAndGet();
            
            // è¾¾åˆ°æ‰¹æ¬¡å¤§å°åˆ™ä¿å­˜
            if (batchList.size() &gt;= BATCH_SIZE) {
                saveBatchData();
                // æ¸…ç©ºåˆ—è¡¨é‡Šæ”¾å†…å­˜
                batchList.clear();
            }
        } else {
            failCount.incrementAndGet();
            log.warn("æ•°æ®éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥: {}", user);
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®è¯»å–å®Œæˆåè§¦å‘
     */
    @Override
    public void doAfterAllAnalysed(AnalysisContext context) {
        // å¤„ç†å‰©ä½™æ•°æ®
        if (!batchList.isEmpty()) {
            saveBatchData();
            batchList.clear();
        }
        log.info("å½“å‰Sheetå¯¼å…¥ç»“æŸï¼ŒæˆåŠŸ: {}, å¤±è´¥: {}", successCount.get(), failCount.get());
    }

    /**
     * æ‰¹é‡ä¿å­˜æ•°æ®
     */
    private void saveBatchData() {
        try {
            // è°ƒç”¨ä¸šåŠ¡å±‚æ‰¹é‡ä¿å­˜ï¼ˆå¸¦äº‹åŠ¡ï¼‰
            userService.batchSaveUsers(batchList);
            log.debug("æ‰¹é‡ä¿å­˜æˆåŠŸï¼Œæ•°é‡: {}", batchList.size());
        } catch (Exception e) {
            log.error("æ‰¹é‡ä¿å­˜å¤±è´¥ï¼Œæ•°é‡: {}", batchList.size(), e);
            // å¤±è´¥å¤„ç†ï¼šå¯è®°å½•å¤±è´¥æ•°æ®åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶æˆ–æ•°æ®åº“
            handleSaveFailure(batchList);
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ•°æ®éªŒè¯é€»è¾‘
     */
    private boolean validateUser(User user) {
        // åŸºç¡€å­—æ®µéªŒè¯ï¼ˆæ ¹æ®å®é™…ä¸šåŠ¡è°ƒæ•´ï¼‰
        if (user == null) return false;
        if (user.getId() == null) return false;
        if (user.getName() == null || user.getName().trim().isEmpty()) return false;
        return true;
    }

    /**
     * å¤„ç†ä¿å­˜å¤±è´¥çš„æ•°æ®
     */
    private void handleSaveFailure(List&lt;User&gt; failedData) {
        // å®ç°å¤±è´¥æ•°æ®çš„å¤„ç†é€»è¾‘ï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚å†™å…¥å¤±è´¥æ—¥å¿—è¡¨ï¼‰
        // userService.saveFailedData(failedData);
    }

    // Getteræ–¹æ³•ç”¨äºç»Ÿè®¡ç»“æœ
    public long getSuccessCount() {
        return successCount.get();
    }

    public long getFailCount() {
        return failCount.get();
    }
}

</code></pre>
<p>å¯¼å…¥Serviceç±»</p>
<pre><code class="language-java">package com.example.easyexcel.service;

import com.alibaba.excel.EasyExcel;
import com.alibaba.excel.support.ExcelTypeEnum;
import com.example.easyexcel.listener.SheetCountListener;
import com.example.easyexcel.listener.UserImportListener;
import com.example.easyexcel.model.User;
import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
import org.springframework.scheduling.concurrent.ThreadPoolTaskExecutor;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong;


/**
 * ç™¾ä¸‡çº§Excelæ•°æ®å¯¼å…¥æœåŠ¡
 */
@Service
@Slf4j
public class ExcelImportService {

    private final ThreadPoolTaskExecutor excelExecutor;
    private final UserService userService;

    public ExcelImportService(ThreadPoolTaskExecutor excelExecutor, UserService userService) {
        this.excelExecutor = excelExecutor;
        this.userService = userService;

    }

    /**
     * å¤šçº¿ç¨‹å¯¼å…¥ç™¾ä¸‡çº§ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®ï¼ˆæ¯ä¸ªSheetä¸€ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹ï¼‰
     */
    public void importMillionUsers(MultipartFile file) throws IOException {
        // 1. ä¿å­˜æˆä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œé¿å…å¤šçº¿ç¨‹å…±ç”¨ InputStream
        java.io.File tmpFile = java.io.File.createTempFile("excel_", ".xlsx");
        file.transferTo(tmpFile);          // Spring æä¾›çš„é›¶æ‹·è´
        tmpFile.deleteOnExit();            // JVM é€€å‡ºæ—¶è‡ªåŠ¨æ¸…ç†

        ExcelTypeEnum excelType = getExcelType(file.getOriginalFilename());

        // 2. æ‹¿ sheet æ•°é‡
        int sheetCount;
        try (InputStream in = new java.io.FileInputStream(tmpFile)) {
            sheetCount = getSheetCount(in);
        }
        log.info("å¼€å§‹å¯¼å…¥ï¼Œæ€» Sheet æ•°: {}", sheetCount);

        // 3. å¹¶å‘è¯»ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ª Sheet ç‹¬ç«‹ FileInputStream
        AtomicLong totalSuccess = new AtomicLong(0);
        AtomicLong totalFail    = new AtomicLong(0);

        List&lt;CompletableFuture&lt;Void&gt;&gt; futures = new ArrayList&lt;&gt;(sheetCount);
        for (int sheetNo = 0; sheetNo &lt; sheetCount; sheetNo++) {
            final int idx = sheetNo;
            futures.add(CompletableFuture.runAsync(() -&gt; {
                try (InputStream in = new java.io.FileInputStream(tmpFile)) {
                    UserImportListener listener = new UserImportListener(userService);
                    EasyExcel.read(in, User.class, listener)
                            .excelType(excelType)
                            .sheet(idx)
                            .doRead();

                    totalSuccess.addAndGet(listener.getSuccessCount());
                    totalFail.addAndGet(listener.getFailCount());
                    log.info("Sheet {} å®Œæˆï¼ŒæˆåŠŸ: {}, å¤±è´¥: {}", idx, listener.getSuccessCount(), listener.getFailCount());
                } catch (IOException e) {
                    throw new RuntimeException("Sheet " + idx + " è¯»å–å¤±è´¥", e);
                }
            }, excelExecutor));
        }

        CompletableFuture.allOf(futures.toArray(new CompletableFuture[0])).join();
        log.info("å…¨éƒ¨å¯¼å…¥å®Œæˆï¼Œæ€»æˆåŠŸ: {}ï¼Œæ€»å¤±è´¥: {}", totalSuccess.get(), totalFail.get());
    }

    /**
     * è·å–Excelä¸­çš„Sheetæ•°é‡
     */
    private int getSheetCount(InputStream inputStream) {
        SheetCountListener countListener = new SheetCountListener();
        EasyExcel.read(inputStream)
                .registerReadListener(countListener)
                .doReadAll();
        return countListener.getSheetCount();
    }

    /**
     * è·å–Excelæ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹
     *
     */
    public ExcelTypeEnum getExcelType(String fileName) {
        if (fileName == null) return null;
        if (fileName.toLowerCase().endsWith(".xlsx")) {
            return ExcelTypeEnum.XLSX;
        } else if (fileName.toLowerCase().endsWith(".xls")) {
            return ExcelTypeEnum.XLS;
        }
        return null;
    }


}

</code></pre>
<h3 id="3ï¸âƒ£-controller">3ï¸âƒ£ Controller</h3>
<pre><code class="language-java"> @PostMapping("/import")
@ApiOperation("å¯¼å…¥ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®")
public ResponseEntity&lt;String&gt; importUsers(@RequestParam("file") MultipartFile file) {
    try {
        if (file.isEmpty()) {
            return ResponseEntity.badRequest().body("è¯·é€‰æ‹©è¦å¯¼å…¥çš„æ–‡ä»¶");
        }

        String fileName = file.getOriginalFilename();
        ExcelTypeEnum excelType = importService.getExcelType(fileName);
        if (excelType == null) {
            return ResponseEntity.badRequest().body("ä¸æ”¯æŒçš„æ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹ï¼Œæ–‡ä»¶åï¼š" +  fileName);
        }

        importService.importMillionUsers(file);
        return ResponseEntity.ok("æ–‡ä»¶å¯¼å…¥æˆåŠŸï¼Œæ­£åœ¨åå°å¤„ç†æ•°æ®");
    } catch (Exception e) {
        log.error("å¯¼å…¥ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥", e);
        return ResponseEntity.status(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR)
                .body("å¯¼å…¥å¤±è´¥ï¼š" + e.getMessage());
    }
}
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2 id="æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜åŒ–æŠ€å·§">æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜åŒ–æŠ€å·§</h2>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>æŠ€å·§</th>
<th>è¯´æ˜</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>åˆ†æ‰¹æŸ¥è¯¢</td>
<td>é¿å…ä¸€æ¬¡æ€§åŠ è½½å…¨è¡¨</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>åˆ†æ‰¹å†™å…¥</td>
<td>æ¯5kæ¡æ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶</td>
<td>å¹¶å‘è¯»æ—¶å…ˆ <code>MultipartFile.transferTo(tmp)</code></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>çº¿ç¨‹æ± </td>
<td>é…ç½®ä¸“ç”¨çº¿ç¨‹æ± ï¼Œéš”ç¦»ä¸šåŠ¡çº¿ç¨‹</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<pre><code class="language-yaml"># application.yml
spring:
  task:
    execution:
      pool:
        core-size: 10
        max-size: 30
        queue-capacity: 1000
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2 id="å¸¸è§é—®é¢˜--è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆ">å¸¸è§é—®é¢˜ &amp; è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆ</h2>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>é—®é¢˜</th>
<th>è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆ</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td><code>Can not create temporary file!</code></td>
<td>å¹¶å‘è¯»æ—¶å…ˆä¿å­˜ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå†ç‹¬ç«‹æµè¯»å–</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><code>Stream Closed</code></td>
<td>æ¯ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡ç‹¬ç«‹ <code>InputStream</code></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><code>OutOfMemoryError</code></td>
<td>åˆ†æ‰¹å¤„ç† + åŠæ—¶ <code>clear()</code></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<hr>
<h2 id="æ€»ç»“">æ€»ç»“</h2>
<p>âœ… <strong>Spring Boot + EasyExcel</strong> åœ¨ <strong>é›¶ä¾µå…¥</strong> çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹å³å¯å®Œæˆç™¾ä¸‡çº§æ•°æ®çš„å¯¼å…¥å¯¼å‡ºã€‚<br>
âœ… é€šè¿‡ <strong>åˆ†æ‰¹ã€å¹¶å‘ã€é¡ºåºå†™</strong> ç­‰æŠ€å·§ï¼Œå†…å­˜å ç”¨é™ä½ <strong>90%</strong> ä»¥ä¸Šã€‚<br>
ğŸš€ å®Œæ•´ä»£ç å‚è€ƒï¼š<a href="https://github.com/u014427391/springbootexamples/tree/master/springboot-easyexcel-batch" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">springboot-easyexcel-batch</a></p>
<hr>
<blockquote>
<p>å¦‚æœæœ¬æ–‡å¯¹ä½ æœ‰å¸®åŠ©ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿ Star &amp; Fork æºç ï¼</p>
</blockquote>
